page.title: 04FAMILY LIFE SURVEY
page.content: {FAMILY LIFE SURVEY SIZE:The average height of 10-11 year old children is 147cm.Their average mass is 38kg.The difference in height between the tallest and shortest is 26cm and the difference in mass is 16kg. ORIGINS:96% of the children were born in Leicestershire. FAMILIES:Each family had an average of 2.5 children. POSSESSIONS:Each family had an average of 1.3 cars,2.1 T.V.'s and 3.1 bicycles. HOBBIES:Over one third of children's hobbies were sporting activities.Over two thirds of parent's hobbies were sporting activities.Only 1 in 16 children visited the cinema and 1 in 8 went to church.Only 1 in 28 parents visited the cinema.
